Prisoner who escaped Corrections’ custody during Waikato Hospital visit is recaptured – police https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prisoner-who-escaped- Corrections-custody-during-waikato-hospital-visit-is-recaptured-police/VE75Z2KHHJBKFPFONOLEKREHNY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prisoner-who-escaped- Corrections-custody-during-waikato-hospital-visit-is-recaptured-police/VE75Z2KHHJBKFPFONOLEKREHNY/ Video footage showed shirtless man sliding several storeys down pipe before running away. Wed, 01 Jan 2025 01:21:31 +0000 Police had been looking for Spring Hill prisoner Damon Anderson since he allegedly escaped from Waikato Hospital by scaling down a pipe last month. He was recaptured this morning.
